titleStmt.title: Stela inscription from Trapeang Don Mas, Siem Reap province (K. 843, 947 śaka)

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
Face A
947 śaka saptamī ket· bhadrapada steṅ·
Añ· stuk· ciñcāñ· sabhāpati na triṇī khcya kamrateṅ· Añ·
vraḥ guru sabhāpati sruk· bhogapura paṅgaṁ thpavaṅ· nivedana ta dhūli
vraḥ pāda kaṁmrateṅ· kaṁtvan· Añ· śrīsūryyavarmmadeva ripi vā
p· vrahma bhavakṣetra Añjeñ· steṅ· Añ· stuk· ciñcāñ· sthāpanā vraḥ
kaṁmrateṅ· Añ· śivaliṅga nu kanloṅa kaṁmrateṅ· Añ· Āy· bhavakṣe
tra nu mās· prāk· pātrakara vraḥ vāp
vrahma ti sāṁ phleya vraḥ steṅ Añ stuk ciñcāñ
vāp· vrahma yok bhūmi noḥ Āy· khloñ·
loñ· śrīdhara ta qji loñ· travāṅ· krapi
vapura sruk· travāṅ· kaṁdvāt· sruk·
loñ· śrīdhara duñ· ta vāp· dr̥ḍha khlo
ñ jnvāl chatradhāra sruk thmi Oy dakṣiṇā steṅ Añ stuk ciñcāñ {1}
gi nu bhūmi man steṅ Añ stuk ciñcāñ jau ta chatradhāra sruk thmi @ bhū
mi travāṅ qleṅ man duñ ta vāp sa vāp vai vāp {2} vāp cān vāp
so vāp bhima vāp bhima sot vāp heṅ @ qnak vraḥ mahānasa ta dau nā
{3} catvāri svaṁ leṅ bhūmi noḥ jā vraḥ karuṇā prasāda to steṅ Añ
stuk ciñcāñ @ mān vraḥ karuṇā pandval ta mratāñ khloñ ta cak {2}
juṅ kryāṅ gi ta nāṁ vraḥ Ālakṣaṇa vraḥ sabhā mratāñ [khloñ]
śrīvijayendrapandita smvat vraḥ dharmmaśāstra Iśvarapura pre dau {3}
{3} jayaśrīy hau qnak ta Oy bhūmi noḥ jā dakṣiṇā [kā]l {1}
{1} pre chvāt saṅ gol Oy jā vraḥ karuṇā prasāda ta steṅ Añ
stuk ciñcāñ {4} neḥh dau hau loñ vrahma nu {2}
{2} ta bhūmi roḥh neḥh nāṁ chvāt saṅ gol Oy roḥh vraḥ karuṇā
caṅvāt bhūmi dakṣiṇā ti qīśāna Agneya travāṅ gnaṅ ti Agneya {1}
{1} travāṅ svāy @ ti nair̥tiya le thnal travāṅ veṅ ti dakṣiṇa phlu
paṁji ratha slvat dau vap ta gol nā phlu dakṣiṇa travāṅ ti vāyayva ta gi phlu
travāṅ qleṅ @ caṅvatt bhūmi man duñ ta chatradhāra sruk thmi ti qīśāna nā
travāṅ gnaṅ dau pūrvva vap ta teṁ sak ta vyar ti agne kaṁvaṅ travāṅ vāp
{1} ti agneya {1} nair̥tiya ta gi muṁ travāṅ qnak samajā ti vāyavya
vāyavya ta gi phlu ji ratha @ caṅvātt bhūmi travāṅ qleṅ toy pūrvva tarāp
{1} nā saptaparṇṇa ti agneya ta gol nā krasāṅ @ toy dakṣiṇa
prasap nu bhūmi travāṅ Aṁvil ti nair̥tiya gol ta gi phlu tadiṅ @ ti
paścima ta gi thnval travāṅ qleṅ ti pūrvva slvat dau Uttara vap ta gol
vāk {4} dau pūrvva vap ta gol prasap bhūmi man chloñ vi-
dyāmaya duñ ta qnak ta roḥ {5} mahānasa Utta[ra] Face B
{6} gol prasap ta bhūmi ma {8} jū {1}
{4} [qna]k ta roḥh neḥh {6} na saṅ {1}

Face C
(C1) {4} pāṅ tai thqyak snoṅ tai kanruṅ ti loñ vrahma lo {3}
(C2) {1} tai {1}n ti mratāñ khloñ turaṅ Oy kāl dau saṅ gol {3}
(C3) {1}n tai kaṁvai tai kan {1} n ti qnak Oy dakṣiṇā phoṅ {5}
(C4) {3} tai paroṅ ti duñ tai kansān ti qnak Oy nā saṅ gol khloñ {1}
(C5) qnak vraḥ {3} Oy kāl śodhe pi yok qme kule {1} ti {2} Oy ta {1}
(C6) mrateṅ tai {3} ta gi 936 śaka nu dhūli vraḥ pāda kaṁmrateṅ kaṁtvan Añ śrī- % 936: pourrait à la rigueur être lu 926 (Cœdès).
(C7) sūryyavarmmadeva {3} steṅ [Añ stuk] ciñcāñ homa Āy kanloṅ {2}
(C8) roha ta dhūli vraḥ {3}ntāl ta {8} sabhāsat @ ta gi [9]-
(C9) 33 śaka pandval pre nak dār jmaḥ {15} % [9]33: pourrait à la rigueur être lu 923 (Cœdès).
(C10) steṅ qyak teṅ Āja nu kule noḥ {14}
(C11) ṅ Añ śaṅkara mān bhūmibhāga man Añ Oy daya steṅi vraḥ {8} % daya: “Lecture incertaine” (Cœdès).
(C12) bhūmi jiracc cat caṁnat Āyatta ta santāna Añ ta mūla pradvān dau {3} mūla {1}
(C13) {1} kule Añ tyaṅ man bhūmi nu qupāya noḥh phoṅ viṅ Āyatta ta santāna Añ da-
(C14) ha qyat kule Añ ta mūla santāna qnak neḥ ta mūla thve vraḥ rājakāryya ta gi bhūmi
(C15) Añ nā bhāga khnet daha mān santāna teṅ tvan svāy ta mān dharmma roḥh ta praśasta
(C16) Āc paripāla vraḥ neḥ bhāga rṇṇoc Āyatta ta kvan cau teṅ nārāyana ta
(C17) paṁnvās ni pi mān dharmma @ neḥ phoṅ pratipakṣa syaṅ ta viṅ stāp kāryya ta kule A-
(C18) ñ ta paṁnvās ni pi mān dharmma gi ta stāp varttamāna @ vvaṁ Āc ti Āyatta ta kule Añ
(C19) ta mūla nu pradhāna @ velā mān pi thve pāñji paṁnvās Oy pāñji pratyeka
(C20) leṅ mūla @ caṅvātt bhūmi vraḥ sre jaṁhvat mvāy dakṣiṇa srukk sma {2} % jaṁhvat: jaṁvhat (IC).
(C21) pūrvva paścima vap ta sīmā viṅ dau Uttara siddha ta vraḥ nu sre tuvauv riy {2}
(C22) {1} cval ta caṅvāt Āyatta ta qnak ta thve rājakāryya nu mūla @ riy vraḥ liṅga Āy [vnur]
(C23) sramo Āyatta teṅ su daha qyat kvan ta ket ta śarira noḥh viṅ Āyatta ta
(C24) kule Añ ta paṁnvās ni @ ta gi Aṣṭatrininava śaka loñ vrahma Añjeñ {1}
(C25) kvan gotra phqvan ta slāp Oy sre noḥ paścima caṁnatt jā dakṣiṇā @ Añ O-
(C26) y mās prāk khnāt mvāy ṅan liṅ 10 vvaṁ cañ vleṅ ta loñ vrahma qukk kāla
(C27) yajña kamrateṅ Añ Āy vracc @ ta gi śūnyacatvārīnava śaka loñ leṁ khloñ
(C28) [ka]ndvār vraḥ chpār yok padigaḥ Añ mvāy jyaṅ prām Oy saṁ lmat ta bhūmi paści- % saṁ lmat ta: “Ou salmatt?" (Cœdès).
(C29) ma travāṅ qleṅ Aṁvi ta phlu tadiṅ dau Uttara prasap sre daṁnuñ chloñ vidyāma-
(C30) ya @ sre jaṁhvat mvāy toy Uttara panlā {5} dau ta vraḥ vnur sramo {1}
(C31) Āy dakṣiṇa @ sre jaṁhvat vyar Āy travāṅ {4} ti pūrvva pravāha dau ta [te]- (C32) ṅ nārāyana nu teṅ su @ sre jaṁhvat pvān dau para {5} des sāmaja {2} % sāmaja: “Lecture douteuse” (Cœdès).
